reviewText: I bought this for my 3 year old but I find myself watching it too! This dvd is hilarious!
This DVD is awesome if you like cartoons you will like Garfield you will laugh if you feel down just watch Garfield it will cheer you up

After 20th Century Fox released all five volumes of the Garfield & Friends DVD sets, they decided they wanted to make even more money releasing single DVDS with 15 segments on each.

The Episodes on A Cat and His Nerd are:

Wedding Bell Blues
Jukebox Jon
The Great Inventor
Jumping Jon
Supersonic Seymour
John the Barbarian
Jailbird Jon
Rolling Romance
Sit on It
Model Behavior
Garfield Goes Hawaiian
The Black Book
Twice Told Tales
D.J. Jon
Dream Date

I only bought the DVD because I am a fan of the series.
great buy for the money. This has several garfield cartoons. If you are a garfield fan it is a must.
My grandson has watched it 3 times a day for a week now. I think it's a hit.
